body: Just wondering where the search feature is on the new forums. I'm blunt and a sucker for new layouts on things, so it might be right in front of my face for all I know -.-'
body_tagged: Just wondering where the search feature is on the new forums. I'm blunt and a sucker for new layouts on things, so it might be right in front of my face for all I know -.-'
title: Where's the search feature?

replies.body: In the leader boards you can search people up I do not believe that there is a forum searcher I will edit this if I find out

replies.body: There currently is no forum search :c
replies.body_tagged: There currently is no forum search :c

replies.body: To do a quick forum search, go on Google and type in "site:avicus.net/forums KEYWORD".
